pos.text: When you draw Crisis Cards, draw 2 and choose 1 to resolve. Place the other on the bottom of the deck.

opg.text: Once per game, draw 4 Quorum Cards. Choose 1 to resolve and place the rest on the bottom of the deck. You do not need to be President to use this ability.

neg.text: In order to activate a location, you must first discard 2 Skill Cards. If you cannot, discard 1 if you can, then proceed.

pos.text: After you draw a Crisis Card, draw 1 Skill Card of your choice (it may be from outside your skill set).

opg.text: Once per game, you may look at all Loyalty Cards belonging to another player.

neg.text: You start the game with 2 Loyalty Cards (instead of 1).

pos.text: When a player activates the "Administration" or the "Brig" location, you may choose to reduce or increase the difficulty by 2.

opg.text: Once per game, lose 1 population to gain 1 of any other resource type.

neg.text: You may not activate locations occupied by other characters (except the "Brig").

pos.text: When you draw a Crisis Card, all 1 strength Skill Cards count positive for the skill check, and you may draw a used Skill Card of strength 3 or less into your hand after the skill check is resolved.

opg.text: Once per game, after resolving a skill check, instead of discarding the used Skill Cards, draw them into your hand.

neg.text: You may not activate the "Admiral's Quarters" or "Airlock" location.

pos.text: When a player activates the "Admiral's Quarters" or "Airlock" location, you may choose to reduce the difficulty by 3.

opg.text: Once per game, give the President title to the Admiral.

neg.text: At the start of any player's turn, if you have exactly 1 Skill Card in your hand, you must discard it.

pos.text: When you roll a die or a die is rolled on your turn, you may reroll it right afterwards (once per turn). You must use the new result.

opg.text: Once per game, after a player makes a choice on a Crisis Card, you may change it.

neg.text: Your character is not placed on the game board at the start of the game. While not on the game board, you may not move, be moved, or take actions. At the start of your 2nd turn, place your character on the "Hangar Deck" location.

pos.text: When a viper is placed in a space area from the "Reserves," you may choose to pilot it and take 1 action. You may only do this when you are on a Galactica location, excluding the "Brig."

opg.text: Once per game, you may activate up to 6 unmanned vipers.

neg.text: When you are forced to discard Skill Cards, you must discard randomly.

pos.text: When you start your turn piloting a viper, you may take 2 actions during your Action Step (instead of 1).

opg.text: Once per game, after a Crisis Card is revealed and before a choice is made or a skill check started, discard it and draw a new one.

neg.text: When a player chooses you with the "Admiral's Quarters" location, reduce the difficulty by 3.

pos.text: At the end of your turn, you may look at the top card of the Crisis Deck and place it on the top or bottom.

opg.text: Once per game, before resolving a skill check on a Crisis Card, choose the result (Pass or Fail), instead of resolving it normally.

neg.text: During the Sleeper Agent Phase, you are dealt 2 Loyalty Cards (instead of 1) and then moved to the "Brig" location.

pos.text: During your turn, after you use a "Repair" Skill Card, you may take another action (once per turn).

opg.text: Once per game, after cards have been added to a Skill Check (but before revealing them), you may choose a skill type. All cards of the chosen type are considered strength 0.

neg.text: Your hand limit is 8 (instead of 10).

pos.text: When you end your Movement step in the same location as another human player, you may give that player 1 Skill Card from your hand to draw 2 Skill Cards.

opg.text: Once per game, you may take the Admiral or President title at the start of your turn. Return that title to its previous owner at the end of your turn.

neg.text: Your Skill set includes Treachery. (Human players can't use text abilities of Treachery Cards.)

pos.text: When an "Admiral's Quarters" Skill check is passed with a 10 or more, you may choose to execute that character instead of sending him to the "Brig."

opg.text: Once per game, if at 6 or less distance, draw 2 civilian ships and destroy them to immediately jump the fleet (even if the fleet marker is on a red space), then reset jump prep. The Admiral only draws 1 Destination Card.

neg.text: If there is a basestar on the main board, skip the "Jump Preparation Step" of your turn.

pos.text: When you would roll a die during your Action step, you may instead discard a Skill Card. Use the card's strength +2 instead of the die roll.

opg.text: Once per game while piloting a viper, send yourself to "Sickbay" to destroy 5 raiders, 2 heavy raiders, 1 basestar, or 1 civilian ship in your space area.

neg.text: At the end of your Action step, if you are in the same location or space area that you were in at the start of your turn, you are moved to "Sickbay."

pos.text: When you launch yourself in a Viper, you may take 2 additional actions instead of 1.

opg.text: Once per game while piloting a viper, send yourself to "Sickbay" to destroy 5 raiders, 2 heavy raiders, 1 basestar, or 1 civilian ship in your space area.

neg.text: At the end of your Action step, if you are in the same location or space area that you were in at the start of your turn, you are moved to "Sickbay."

pos.text: When you activate the "Communications" location, you may look at every civilian ship on the game board and may move any number of them.

opg.text: Once per game, before making a Skill check, look at the top 3 cards of any Skill deck (even outside your Skill set), and add all of them to either the Skill check or your hand.

neg.text: When morale is reduced to 2 or less, you are executed. If you are human, do not lose 1 morale.

pos.text: Draw 1 Skill Card at random from a player's hand. Then, that player draws 1 card from the Skill deck of your choice (it may be from outside his Skill set).

opg.text: Once per game, after all Skill Cards played into a Skill check have been revealed, you may play any number of Skill Cards from your hand into the check.

neg.text: You must discard 1 Skill Card to activate the "Cylon Fleet" location.

pos.text: Place 1 basestar in front of Galactica, or if all basestars are in play, you may remove 1 from the game board. You may then place 3 raiders in front of Galactica and 1 civilian ship behind Galactica.

opg.text: Once per game you may take 2 Actions.

neg.text: When a player reveals a "You are a Cylon" Loyalty Card, you must discard all Skill Cards in your hand.

pos.header: Glimpse the Face of God - Movement
pos.text: Draw 2 cards from the top of the Destiny deck, then place 2 cards from your hand on top of the Destiny deck.

opg.text: Once per game, exchange your hand of Skill Cards with another player's hand of Skill Cards.

neg.text: You may not voluntarily move to a location that contains another character.

pos.text: After any player uses the action on a Quorum Card, you may draw 2 Skill Cards of your choice (they may be from outside your skill set) and keep 1.

opg.text: Once per game, you may examine the top 5 cards of the Quorum deck, and return them to the top of the deck in any order you choose (even if you are not currently the President).

neg.text: When you make a choice on a Crisis Card, you must choose the first option.

pos.text: Anytime "FTL Control" is activated, you may reroll the die. You must use the new result.

opg.text: Once per game, you may take the Admiral title. If you are in the "Brig" when you take this action, move immediately to "Command" before taking the title.

neg.text: You may not play more than 3 cards into any skill check.

pos.text: Discard any number of Skill Cards. Then draw that number of Skill Cards from any one type within your skill set.

opg.text: Once per game, you may choose the result of your die roll or a die roll on your turn instead of rolling it. This result cannot be modified or rerolled.

neg.text: Skip the Receive Skills Step of your first turn.

pos.text: On your turn, once all Skill Cards played into a skill check have been revealed, you may choose 1 card to discard before resolving skill check abilities and totalling strength.

opg.text: Once per game, you may execute another character who is in your current location.

neg.text: You cannot contribute only 1 Skill Card into a skill check. You must either contribute no Skill Cards or contribute 2 or more Skill Cards. (Disregard this while you are in the "Brig.")

pos.text: When a Crisis Card requires you to discard Skill Cards, reduce the number of cards you discard by 1 (once per Crisis Card).

opg.text: Once per game, move a character in the "Brig" to any non-hazardous location on Galactica. If he belongs to another player, take all of that player's Skill Cards.

neg.text: If you end your Movement Step in a location with another player, you must discard 2 Skill Cards. If you cannot, you are sent to the "Brig" at the end of your turn.

pos.text: AFter you use an "Executive Order" Skill Card and the chosen player has finished moving and taking actions, you may activate your current location.

opg.text: Once per game, when you must make a choice on a Crisis Card, you may choose to have the result be: "The current player discards 5 Skill Cards."

neg.text: When you draw a Mutiny Card, you must discard 2 Skill Cards.

pos.text: AFter you use an "Executive Order" Skill Card and the chosen player has finished moving and taking actions, you may activate your current location.

opg.text: Once per game, when you must make a choice on a Crisis Card, you may choose to have the result be: "The current player discards 5 Skill Cards."

neg.text: When you are forced to discard Skill Cards, you must discard randomly.

pos.text: Each time a player draws a Mutiny Card, you instead look at the top 2 cards of the Mutiny deck, give 1 to that player, and place the other on the bottom of the deck.

opg.text: Once per game, draw 4 Mutiny Cards. Choose 1 of them to play and place the other 3 Mutiny Cards on the bottom of the deck. Ignore your "Necessary Steps" ability and do not move to the "Brig."

neg.text: You start the game with 1 Mutiny Card.

pos.text: Once per turn, if you activate "Command," "Communications," or "Weapons Control," you may discard 1 Skill Card to immediately activate that location again.

opg.text: Once per game, if you are not in the "Brig," activate any 3 undamaged locations, regardless of where you are. You cannot activate the same location more than once or any Cylon locations.

neg.text: You must discard 1 Skill Card to use a Skill Card action.

pos.text: When you look at the top card of a deck as a result of a "Launch Scout" card, look at the top 2 cards instead and, in the order of your choosing, place each card on the top or the bottom of the deck.

opg.text: Once per game, during the Remove Ships step of Jumping the Fleet, lose 1 fuel to gain 2 population.

neg.text: If you are not on Galactica, draw 1 fewer Skill Card during your Receive Skills step.

pos.text: Once per turn, immediately after population is reduced, you may draw the top 3 cards from the Piloting deck, discard 1 of them, and keep the other 2 cards.

opg.text: Once per game, before flipping over a civilian ship in a space area and destroying it, you may destroy an undamaged viper instead. Shuffle the civilian ship back into the pile of unused civilian ships.

neg.text: Any time a viper you are piloting is damaged, destroy it instead.

pos.text: Choose a human player and draw 2 Skill Cards from his skill set. Then, give him 2 Skill Cards from your hand.

opg.text: Once per game, look at each civilian ship on the board. Choose 1 and draw a new civilian ship to replace it if possible. Shuffle the chosen ship back into the pile of unused civilian ships.

neg.text: You cannot use actions printed on Engineering Cards.

pos.text: While Infiltrating, draw 2 extra Skill Cards on your turn instead of 1. Disregard this ability while you are in "Sickbay."

opg.text: Once per game, when you use an action to end your Infiltration, you may move to any Cylon location and take another action instead of moving to the Resurrection Ship.

neg.text: You cannot contribute to skill checks during another player's Action Step.

pos.text: If you are Infiltrating, choose a human player and look at 1 of his Loyalty Cards at random. Then, end your Infiltration and move to the "Resurrection Ship."

opg.text: Once per game, draw 2 Super Crisis Cards.

neg.text: If you are on the "Resurrection Ship" location (but not the "Hub Destroyed" location), you must discard a Super Crisis Card to move to a different location.

pos.text: Once per turn, when another player must discard 1 or more Skill Cards (except when discarding down to his hand limit), you may draw 1 Treachery Card to reduce the number of cards he discards by 1.

opg.text: Once per game, activate any undamaged location.

neg.text: When you are in a hazardous location, you cannot draw Skill Cards during your "Receive Skills" or "Draw Skills" step.

pos.text: You may contribute 2 Skill Cards to skill checks, or 3 Skill Cards when Infiltrating. Disregard this ability while you are in the "Brig."

opg.text: Once per game, at the start of a player's "Activate Cylon Ships" step, either choose a Cylon ship type to activate or launch raiders. Ignore any Activate Cylon Ships icons on the bottom of the Crisis Card.

neg.text: When you play any Skill Cards into a skill check, you must play 1 face up.

pos.text: During your "Receive Skills" Step, you may choose to draw 1 Quorum Card instead of 2 Politics Cards. This is your own personal hand (separate from the President's), cannot be passed, and you may play them even without being President by discarding a Skill Card.

opg.text: Once per game after the "Administration" skill check has been resolved, you may change the result.

neg.text: Discard 2 Skill Cards everytime someone is sent to the "Brig" or reveals themselves as a Cylon.

pos.text: Once per turn, you may activate 1 unmanned viper right before a human ship would be shot at. This applies even if this would prevent the human ship from being shot at.

opg.text: Once per game, if population is 2 or more, lose 1 population to destroy up to 5 raiders, 2 heavy raiders, 1 basestar or 2 centurions in the same area anywhere on the main board.

neg.text: When the Fleet reaches the 2nd last Destination (before the final jump), initiate an "Airlock" (independent of the actual location) skill check targeting yourself.

pos.text: Anytime "FTL Control" is activated, you may reroll the die. You must use the new result.

opg.text: Once per game, you may move the fleet token 1 space in either direction on the Jump Preparation Track. If you are in the FTL Control location, you may then activate that location.

neg.text: If you end your movement step in a different location on the same ship, discard a Skill card if possible.

pos.text: You may treat any Pegasus location as if it were "Command".

opg.text: Once per game, you may damage Pegasus twice to destroy a Basestar and all Cylon ships sharing its location. This ability may only be used if you are in a Pegasus location and two or more Pegasus locations are undamaged. If Pegasus is destroyed, jump rope to change to Apollo (setup in "Sickbay").

neg.text: If you end your movement step in a different location on the same ship, discard a Skill card if possible.

pos.text: When you activate "Weapons Control", "CIC" or "Main Batteries" on your turn, you may treat the roll as though Strategic Planning has been applied. If you do, no other Strategic Planning may be played on this roll.

opg.text: Once per game, you may gain 1 Food; or you may lose 2 Food to gain 1 Morale or to draw 5 cards (may be from outside your Skill set).

neg.text: Though you draw Piloting you may not man a Viper.

pos.text: Your manned viper can move 1 extra space, and you may choose to have enemy ships ignore it when attacking.

opg.text:
Once per game, after a Destination has been chosen, put that card at the bottom of the Destination deck, and choose another one as if you were the Admiral.

If you are executed as a human, you may choose to keep this character or use the original.

neg.text: Whenever a Crisis Card requires you to make a choice, you must discard a Skill Card at random. If you have a title, then all other human players must also do the same.

pos.text: When sharing a section of space with another Viper, you may take an extra pilot movement/action.

opg.text: Once per game, all Vipers currently in space may take 1 attack action. You control the unmanned Vipers, while manned Vipers are controlled by their pilot.

neg.text: Whenever you return from a Viper after having engaged in combat at least once (including Cylons trying to attack you), move to Sickbay.

pos.text: On your turn, before any die is rolled, you may discard 1 Skill Card to add or subtract 1 from the result (limit once per roll).

opg.text: Once per game, if you are not in the "Brig", discard all Skill Cards and lose any titles to move to the "Resurrection Ship". You may view the top 5 cards of the Super Crisis Deck and place them on the top or bottom in any order and combination. You are treated as a revealed Cylon player until the start of your next turn, upon which you draw Skill Cards and move to the "Hangar Deck".

neg.text: You are dealt 2 Loyalty Cards at the beginning of the game, but none during the Sleeper Agent Phase.

pos.text: On your turn, before any die is rolled, you may discard 1 Skill Card to add or subtract 1 from the result (limit once per roll).

opg.text: Once per game, you may render inactivate any non-hazardous 1 Human or Cylon location until the start of your next turn.

neg.text: You are dealt 2 Loyalty Cards at the beginning of the game, but none during the Sleeper Agent Phase.

pos.text: When you use the "Scientific Research" Skill Card, you can make any Skill type of your choice positive or negative.

opg.text: Once per game, look at the top 4 cards of the Crisis deck, then place them on the top or bottom of the deck in any order and combination.

neg.text: Your hand limit is 8 (instead of 10).

pos.text: Before every skill check on your turn, look through the Destiny deck and select 2 cards to place on top. "Investigative Committee" cards may not be played after this. Shuffle the Destiny deck after resolving the check.

opg.header: All This Has Happened Before - Action
opg.text: Once per game, you may discard 3 random Skill Cards to look through the discarded Crisis Cards, choose 1 of them and place it back on top of the Crisis Deck.

neg.text: When participating in a skill check, any cards you wish to contribute must be chosen randomly.

pos.text: Once per turn, when any characters would go to "Sickbay" as a result of a damaged vehicle, draw 2 Skill Cards (may be out of your Skill set). Then for each character, roll a die and on a 3 or higher move the character to the "Hangar Deck" instead.

opg.text: Once per game, damage an occupied location of your choice on Galactica. Then you must destroy up to 2 centurions (nearest to the end) if any.

neg.text: When your current location is damaged, move to the Brig instead of Sickbay.

pos.text: Following your "Receive Skills" step, draw 1 card of any Skill type. Then choose 1 card from your hand to discard.

opg.text: Once per game, discard Skill Cards with a minimum total strength of 20 to raise or lower any resource by 1.

neg.text: When any Loyalty Cards are viewed, you must reveal 1 of your Loyalty Cards (at random) to the player whose Loyalty Cards are being viewed.

pos.text: If another player chooses you as the target of an "Executive Order" Skill Card, you may take an additional movement.

opg.text: Once per game, you may draw and destroy 1 civilian ship to cancel the text effects of a Crisis Card. Proceed to "Activate Cylon Ships" step.

neg.text: You draw 2 Treachery Cards whenever you are the target of a Quorum or Skill Card effect.

pos.text: Once per turn, draw 2 Leadership Cards whenever a raptor is risked.

opg.text: Once per game, look at the top 3 cards of the Destination deck, then place them on the top or bottom of the deck in any order and combination.

neg.text: Each time you roll for your manned viper, discard a Skill Card or -1 to the result.

pos.text: Once per turn, draw 2 Leadership Cards whenever a raptor is risked.

opg.text: Once per game, when a new jump destination is chosen, you may either negate all resource loss or increase any single resource loss by one.

neg.text: Each time you roll for your manned viper, discard a Skill Card or -1 to the result.

pos.text: Once per turn, if you are in the "Hangar Deck" location, you may play a "Repair" Skill Card from your hand to repair up to 3 damaged vipers.

opg.header: Break the Chains of Society - Movement or Action
opg.text: Once per game, draw 6 Piloting or Engineering Skill Cards in any combination.

neg.text: You may not launch yourself in a viper as long as there are damaged vipers.

pos.text: Once per turn, draw a Skill Card whenever you play an Engineering Skill Card for its text.

opg.text: Once per game, when any Galactica or Pegasus damage token is to be resolved, you may pick any undamaged Galactica or Pegasus location to damage instead (doesn't need to be the same ship).

neg.text: You may never become the Admiral or the CAG.

pos.text: Once per turn, when you play a Repair card you may return that card to your hand.

opg.text: Once per game, discard all Skill Cards and move to Sickbay, then repair the FTL Control location if damaged, and jump the fleet without drawing any destination cards (reset jump prep and clear enemy ships).

neg.text: At the end of your turn, if you have a title, pass that title to the next player in succession.

pos.text: Once per turn, when you play a Repair card you may return that card to your hand.

opg.text: Once per game, discard all Skill Cards and move to Sickbay. Then repair the FTL Control location if damaged and clear all enemy ships (like after a jump), OR damage FTL Control if possible and bring back all ships from the CFB (resetting token).

neg.text: At the end of any turn, if you have a title, pass that title to the next player in succession.
